thread.title: Stay here if you want to see Paris the right way!!!
thread.title_full: Stay here if you want to see Paris the right way!!! - Review of Splendid Etoile Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Preston M
title: Stay here if you want to see Paris the right way!!!
text:
Not speaking French is not a problem there. Everyone was helpful, professional, and courteous. The rooms are clean, beds are great, and the linen was soft. The Metro station is right outside and the restaurants nearby are great too.
Room Tip: Family rooms are large. Don't cheat yourself pay for the view it's worth the money. See more room tips
